introduction: Our brain works very hard 24 hours a day. So, what food should we eat for maximum brain health? Phil

vocabulary.definition: a sudden feeling of excitement and energy after consuming food high in sugar
vocabulary.example: After eating the ice cream, she experienced a sugar rush and felt full of energy.

vocabulary.definition: a diet that includes the proper combinations of food to maintain good health
vocabulary.example: She follows a balanced diet with plenty of fruits, vegetables, and proteins.

vocabulary.definition: refers to someone who is intelligent and quick to react
vocabulary.example: His sharp mind allowed him to solve the problem in no time.

vocabulary.definition: the process of cooking a large quantity of food at once and storing some for later consumption
vocabulary.example: She practices batch cooking on Sundays to have ready meals for the entire week.
I'm feeling low on energy today; I need to get some rest.

vocabulary.definition: exactly in 20 minutes; used to emphasize the speed of completing a task
vocabulary.example: She finished the project in 20 minutes flat, surprising everyone with her efficiency.
